import React from 'react' import './Post.css' import Comment from '../../../../img/comment.png' import Share from '../../../../img/share.png' import Heart from '../../../../img/like.png' import NotLike from '../../../../img/notlike.png' const Post = ({data}) => { const {user} = useSelector((state)=>state.authReducer.authData) return (
{data.likes} likes
{data.name} {data.description}
) } export default Post
